Android SQLite API based on SQLCipher
To use MiCoin, you need to log in your Xiaomi account. Please enable the Xiaomi account service in Settings-Application Management.

"You're about to use Mi Coin, which is a service provided by Xiaomi Inc. Before you can use this service, you must agree to the Terms of Service. Touch OK if you agree to the terms and conditions described in the %1$s and %2$s. You need to connect to the internet, locate you device to use Mi Coin."
"Can't set App lock while using Split screen."
Due to system upgrade, your current pattern lock has been expired. Please set a new pattern lock.
%1$s will be able to charge you automatically using %2$s without verification.You can turn this feature off in %1$s

string.name: mibi_frozen_text
string.Data: Your account is frozen. <font color=#33aaff>Contact our customer support.</font>

resources.string: Enter the phone number used for payments
Mi Coins added via gift card will be spent first automatically.

string.name: mibi_giftcard_with_num
string.Data: <font color=#FF7700><xliff:g id=value>%1$d</xliff:g> Mi Coin coupon available</font>

resources.string: "Can't use camera now. Turn off Incognito mode in the Settings to be able to use camera."
What can you buy with Mi Coins?
"You're about to use the payment service provided by Xiaomi Inc. Before you start using this service, you must agree the following terms:"
"You've reached the bottom of this list"
Access location info to ensure payment security
After you touch Confirm purchase, your phone will
Topping up via text may be more expensive: <font color=red>￥%1$d = %2$d Mi Coin</font>
Carriers charge a ￥%1$s service fee per top-up
An SMS will be sent to your carrier after you tap \"Top up\". Carrier will charge you for a regular SMS.
"Failed to send message: couldn't connect to network provider."
Failed to send message: try reinserting your SIM card.
"Failed to send message，there's an error in the content."
After you touch Confirm purchase, your phone will
Your network provider has been contacted!
You will receive a text confirmation shortly.
If the payment is unsuccessful, call %1$s
To secure your spendings, verify your Xiaomi Account
Amount must be between Mi Coins %1$s and %2$s.
%1$s Mi Coins recharged，%2$s Mi Coins paied
"You haven't installed %1$s. Download and install it now?"
Failed to install %1$s mobile security plugin
You have not installed %1$s mobile security plugin, install it now?
Allow camera in Settings to use the features.
Access IMEI to ensure payment security
"Selected nominal value must be consistent with that of the prepaid card. Choosing another value will void the card. This action can't be undone."
If the nominal value of the prepaid card is not <font color=red>￥%1$s</font>, the card will be void. Xiaomi is not responsible for any monetary loss that occurs as a result of user error.
"You can't use Mi Coins after authorization has been revoked."
"Where'd you go? This operation has timed out."
%1$s Mi Coins recharged, but payment failed, please retry later.
Top-up will be reflected in you account balance within 3 minutes.
Payment will be complete in about 3 minutes…
"Payment hasn't reached your account yet. We will check again within two working days. Customer service center：400-100-3399"
